'''Alpha 1.0.0.2''' (also known as '''1.0.0 build 5''') is the fifth build version released for [[Pocket Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]], also known as the [[Ender Update]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004166331|title=MCPE Android Beta - 1.0 build 5}}</ref>

== Changes ==

* The [[ender dragon]] now goes towards the nearest [[end crystal]] when damaged.

== Fixes ==

* Fixed a crash when trying to ride a [[horse]].
* Fixed a crash when trying to feed an animal.
* Fixed a crash when a [[player]] loaded a large [[resource pack]] and tried to apply it to a new [[world]].
* Fixed a crash on some Android devices that was due to an <code>ExceptionHolder</code> error.</onlyinclude>
